ModMetaData.name: Rimworld Expanded (1.x)
ModMetaData.author: CTH2004
ModMetaData.packageId:
cth.rwe/packageId>
1.4
Ever wanted more Vanilla Expanded xenotypes? More VE scenarios? More VE content? Well, here you are!
P.S. I am working on 2 parts. One of them is adding new features to this, and the other (which might take a long time, especially as each new feature added makes this step harder) is making a complete re-design. That one will have less "hard requirments" (meaning it won't work without them). For instance, instead of requiring ideology, a feature won't appear [i]unless[/i] you have ideology. As so many features of this mod is interconnected, that requires a lot more work, and therefore a redesign. But, I wanted to get my ideas at least working, so...
